doc.field: Lloyd, Bertram [aka E. Bertram, aka "Wolfie"]: Letters (to, from) Contents: - 1. B.L. [ALS] to E.C., undated, in German, on both sides of a sheet measuring 2.75" x 7.125" - 2. E.C to E.B.L., postcard, 26 Jan 1920, [ALS] - 3. E.C.[?] to "My Dear Wolfie" 2 Jan 1921, [ALS] - 4. E.C. to "Dear Wolfie," 1 Dec 1923 [copy by Lloyd]
